Body: Possible Duplicate:  How-to unlink the main Google account from android device without a factory reset  Logout from Gmail on my device  I have a Sony Ericsson Xperia. I have logged in on it with one of my Gmail accounts.But now I want to change the default gmail account logged in on my phone. How can I do this?Thanks.
Title: How can I sign out from gmail in my Android?

history.Text: I have a Sony Ericsson Xperia. I have entered logged in on it with one of my Gmail accounts.But now I want to change the default gmail account logged in on my phone. How can I change it?Thanks
how can i sign out from gmail in my android?
